Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The people of Australia are abuzz with excitement as the federal budget announcement approaches. With news of a $112 billion debt bomb set to be revealed everyone is wondering how the government plans to navigate these uncertain times. Meanwhile there is controversy brewing over the government's decision to overhaul the migration system to address nursing shortages and provide aged care workers with a pay rise. Stay tuned for updates on these and other important issues impacting the nation.
